Actions.Name: Copy file
Actions.Description: Copies a file on Google Drive

Actions.Name: Create file
Actions.Description: Uploads a file to Google Drive

Actions.Name: Delete file
Actions.Description: Deletes a file from Google Drive

Actions.Name: Extract archive to folder
Actions.Description: Extracts an archive file into a folder in Google Drive (example: .zip)

Actions.Name: Get file content using id
Actions.Description: Retrieves file content from Google Drive using id

Actions.Name: Get file content using path
Actions.Description: Retrieves file content from Google Drive using path

Actions.Name: Get file metadata using id
Actions.Description: Retrieves file metadata from Google Drive using id

Actions.Name: Get file metadata using path
Actions.Description: Retrieves file metadata from Google Drive using path

Actions.Name: List files in folder
Actions.Description: List files in a Google Drive folder

Actions.Name: List files in root folder
Actions.Description: Lists files in the Google Drive root folder

Actions.Name: Update file
Actions.Description: Updates a file in Google Drive
